attributes.action: keep the Employer Supported Childcare scheme
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: In a speech on September 29, 2009, Gordon Brown announced plans to scrap the Employer Supported Childcare scheme, enabled tax payers to offset their childcare from their taxable income, which can save basic rate taxpayers as much as £962 a year, rising to £1,195 for top rate payers.
